films.name: Inception
films.synopsis: Dom Cobb (DiCaprio) is an expert in the art of appropriating, during the dream, the secrets of the subconscious of others. The strange ability of Cobb has turned him into a man highly valued in the world of espionage, but he has also condemned him to be a fugitive and, therefore, to renounce to lead a normal life. Your only chance to change your life will be to do the exact opposite of what you have always done: inception, which involves implanting an idea in the subconscious instead of subtracting it. However, his plan is complicated by the intervention of someone who seems to predict each of his movements, someone that only Cobb can discover.
